html:
{% set copyType = [ { "copyTo": "Buyer's Copy" }, { "copyTo": "Seller's Copy" }, { "copyTo": "Account's Copy" } ]%} {% for copy in copyType %}
{{letter_head}}
TPN:- {{frappe.db.get_value('Company',{'name':'State Trading Corporation of Bhutan Limited'}, 'tax_id')}}
Bank Account Number: {{frappe.db.get_value('Branch', {'name':doc.branch}, 'expense_bank_account' )}}
{{doc.posting_date}}

Tax INVOICE

{{copy.copyTo}}

{{doc.customer_name}}

{{doc.customer}}

{{ frappe.db.get_value('Customer', {'name':doc.customer},'primary_address') }}

CASH SALES NO. {{doc.customer}}
INVOICE NO. {{doc.name}}
INVOICE DATE: {{doc.posting_date}}
DELIVERY CHALLAN NO.
DELIVERY CHALLAN DATE.
Ship To

{{ frappe.db.get_value('Customer', {'name':doc.customer},'primary_address') }}

{{doc.customer_name }} - {{doc.contact_display}}

Vehicle No:
Customer Order No: {{doc.name}}
Customer Order Date: {{doc.posting_date}}
Order No: {{doc.name}}
Order Date: {{doc.posting_date}}
Payment Term Code:
Due Date: {{doc.posting_date}}
Terms of Delivery: {{doc.posting_date}}
{% for row in doc.items%} {% endfor %}
Sr No. No. Model/Parts No. Description of Goods Qty. UOM Rate(Nu.) Amount(Nu.)
{{row.idx}} {{row.item_code}}({{row.item_name}}) {{row.parts_no}} {{row.description}} {{row.qty}} {{row.uom}} {{frappe.format_value(row.rate,{"fieldtype":"Currency"})}} {{frappe.format_value(row.amount,{"fieldtype":"Currency"})}}
Total NU Excl. Taxes

Cash Discount

BST

Freight Recovered

Rounding Off

Total 		{{frappe.format_value(doc.total,{"fieldtype":"Currency"})}}

{{frappe.format_value(doc.discount_amount,{"fieldtype":"Currency"})}}

{{frappe.format_value(doc.total_taxes_and_charges,{"fieldtype":"Currency"})}}

0

0

{{frappe.format_value(doc.grand_total,{"fieldtype":"Currency"})}}
Amount in Words: Ngultrum {{ (doc.in_words)[3:] }}
Received By:
Name & Signature:
CID No:
Mobile No:
Authorised Signatory:
For The Sate Trading Corporation of Bhutan Ltd.
{% if not no_letterhead and footer %}
{{ footer }}
{% endif %}
{% endfor %}
name: Tax Invoice
